name: TNN Motorsports Hardcore Heat
description:
TNN Motorsports Hardcore Heat (バギーヒート Buggy Heat in Japan and Europe) is an off-road racing video game for the Dreamcast, developed by CRI and published in the USA by ASC Games.
Ladies and Gentlemen, get ready for the biggest and wildest race of your life... Get behind the wheel of a 4x4 off road vehicle and prepare to battle your way through various challenging courses from all over the world. Save your 'Artificial Intelligence' skill level and challenge your opponents' best times, or simply go head to head on the toughest maddest, off road racer to hit any console ever.
